name: StringUtil_joiningTest
description: Unit tests for the joining functionality of the StringUtil class.

test_cases.name: testJoiningWithDelimiter
test_cases.description: Tests the joining functionality of the StringUtil with a delimiter.

test_cases.name: testJoiningWithEmptyList
test_cases.description: Tests the joining functionality of the StringUtil with an empty list.

test_cases.name: testJoiningWithSingleElement
test_cases.description: Tests the joining functionality of the StringUtil with a single element list.
